events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred last night at an intersection, resulting in damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle collision and damages.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure prompt and efficient handling of the car accident claim.
The claimant was notified that their auto accident claim had been received and is now under review.
Additional documentation such as police report, photos of damage, and repair estimates were requested to proceed with claim assessment.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the police report and professional photos of the damaged vehicle parts.
Investigation has begun to verify the circumstances of the collision and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation concluded that the collision was the other driver's fault, and damage claims are valid.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs, rental car fees, and other related expenses.
The claimant responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and the handling of their claim.
The claim was officially approved following the agreement on the settlement terms and verification of all paperwork.
Payment was issued promptly to the claimant and the repair shop to cover the auto accident damages.
The claim was closed after confirming that all repairs were completed satisfactorily and the payment was received.
